item.title: Ecto Transactions
item.author: info@makingdevs.com
item.description: It has been a couple of months since I wrote something and was about phoenix and bootstrap. Today I’m going to talk about elixir, ecto and how to manage transactions Well in this post we are going to skip ecto setup (if for some way, it was need it, please leave a comment and I will make a post for it, but I think his documentation makes a fairly good example for it)
